entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
